attributes.action: Stop exorbitant fees for children entitled to British citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
This now a long standing issue, yet it remains unaddressed as it fit well with the current “Hostile environment policy”.

Amnesty international has already produced a report on the subject

Entitled: The price of citizenship
https://www.amnesty.org.uk/blogs/childrens-human-rights-network-blog/uk-price-citizenship

Similarly, The Project for the Registration of Children as British Citizens (PRCBC) 
https://prcbc.wordpress.com/

Please help stop this injustice for the common interest of all.
attributes.background:
-Reduce  current fees (£1012) for children registration to actual cost application £372

-Stop profit of £640 per application

-Make access entitlement to British citizenship a matter of pride not rather encourage division

-Please sign for a fairer society
